title: Tornadoes in Texas cause destruction: Watch videos as storms hit South
excerpt: Tornadoes were caught on multiple videos in Texas amid severe weather.
text: Tornadoes were spotted and caught on videos in Texas as storms battered parts of the South Saturday.A tornado killed at least one person and caused multiple injuries in Brazoria County, Dan Davis, mayor of Manvel, Texas, told USA TODAY via email.Multiple homes were destroyed between Alvin and Liverpool, Texas, when a possible tornado went through the area Saturday afternoon, according to preliminary reports cited by the Storm Prediction Center.In Montgomery County, mobile homes were damaged and a roof was ripped off a home. In Chambers County, a car was thrown by a tornado near Smith Point, potentially causing injuries − according to preliminary reports.Millions remain under tornado watches and warnings through 9 p.m. CT Saturday, and earlier in the day, the National Weather Service issued a rare "particularly dangerous situation" alert.Tornado outbreak: 1 death reported as rare 'particularly dangerous situation' alert warns of tornado dangerA tornado crosses a field in Katy, Texas, on Dec. 28, 2024, in this screengrab obtained from a social media video.Tornado sweeps across Katy, TexasTornado seen in Porter Heights, TexasSevere weather warnings and watches mapThis article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Tornadoes in Texas: Watch videos of damage as storms batter the South
html:
Tornadoes were spotted and caught on videos in Texas as storms battered parts of the South Saturday.

A tornado killed at least one person and caused multiple injuries in Brazoria County, Dan Davis, mayor of Manvel, Texas, told USA TODAY via email.

Multiple homes were destroyed between Alvin and Liverpool, Texas, when a possible tornado went through the area Saturday afternoon, according to preliminary reports cited by the Storm Prediction Center.

In Montgomery County, mobile homes were damaged and a roof was ripped off a home. In Chambers County, a car was thrown by a tornado near Smith Point, potentially causing injuries − according to preliminary reports.

Millions remain under tornado watches and warnings through 9 p.m. CT Saturday, and earlier in the day, the National Weather Service issued a rare "particularly dangerous situation" alert.

Tornado outbreak: 1 death reported as rare 'particularly dangerous situation' alert warns of tornado danger

Tornado sweeps across Katy, Texas

Tornado seen in Porter Heights, Texas

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Tornadoes in Texas: Watch videos of damage as storms batter the South
